sub_topic: Calculating the boiling and melting points of inorganic compounds
message_1: What is the boiling point of MgCl2 (magnesium chloride) at 1 atm?
message_2: The boiling point of magnesium chloride (MgCl2) at 1 atmosphere (atm) is approximately 1412 degrees Celsius (2574 degrees Fahrenheit).
